Posted By: DarthMohawk1 (10/28/2010 12:36:32 PM)
Rating:

@DarthMohawk1
according to the rulings it'll be a 5/5 (not a 4/4) (if you had no other cards in hand to begin with)
12/1/2004 If you pay the entwine cost, you draw five cards, then lose five life, then put the Demon token onto the battlefield. The five cards you draw count toward the Demon's power and toughness.

Posted By: cplmontana (12/23/2011 7:05:52 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Jace's Ingenuity: 5 mana, 3 cards, Instant
  
Promise of Power: 5 mana, 5 life, 5 cards, Sorcery
  
Blue is supposed to be the best color, but if you look at mana costs only, Black is the decisive winner. (Until you go all the way up to Time Walk, which has just a completely \*\*\* cost)
  
Dark Ritual into Dark Ritual into this entwined on the fourth turn or so is particularly Evil Laughter-Inspiring.
  
5/5
